overview:
Darren is the co-founder of a startup currently in alpha mode.

Darren cut his computer programming teeth on a Commodore 64 when he was 7 and hasn’t been able to stop since. After attending Indiana University, he worked as a consultant with McKinsey & Co. for two years and then decided to join a VC firm. He lasted four days before jumping at the opportunity to found an online marketing company in Chicago. After selling his company in 2010, Darren started his MBA at MIT and soon met his cofounder.
